message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a price of $15,000. I think it's a fair price considering its value to you is $10,000. Let me know if you're interested!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  While I appreciate the product, $15,000 is a bit out of my budget.  I'd be willing to pay $10,500 for it.  Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer of $10,500. I appreciate your interest in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13,500. It's still a fair price considering the value you place on the product. Let me know if that works for you!
Alice, I understand you need to make a profit, but $13,500 is still a bit too much for me.  I'm willing to go up to $11,500.  This is a fair price for both of us.  Let's make this deal happen!

Hi Bob, I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still not quite there. I'm thinking more along the lines of $14,000. It's a price that I think is fair considering the value you place on the product. Let's see if we can make it work!
